#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<queue>
using namespace std;

int k; 
queue<int> q;
int degree[100005];
int removed[100005];
vector<int> adj[100005];
 
void BFS()
{
    while(!q.empty())
    {
        int node = q.front();
        q.pop();
        removed[node] = 1;
        for(int i=0; i<adj[node].size(); i++)
        {
            int next = adj[node][i];
            degree[next]--;
            if( (!removed[next]) && degree[next]<k)  removed[next] = 1,q.push(next);
        }
    }
}
 
 
int main()
{
    int n,m,a,b,count=0;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
    for(int i=0; i<m; i++)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        adj[a].push_back(b), degree[a]++;
        adj[b].push_back(a), degree[b]++;
    }
    
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)  if(degree[i]<k)  q.push(i);
    BFS();
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++) if(!removed[i]) count++;
    printf("%d\n",count);
  return 0;
}
